definition: a garment hanging from the waist, avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
details:
noun
- a garment hanging from the waist
- cloth covering that forms the part of a garment below the waist
- informal terms for a (young) woman
= synonyms: bird
- (Fungi) a remnant of the partial veil that in mature mushrooms surrounds the stem like a collar
= synonyms: annulus
verb
- avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
= synonyms: dodge
- extend on all sides of simultaneously
= synonyms: ring
- pass around or about
- form the edge of
